One animal

 

Let's learn the names of some animals!

Vocabulary Section 1
 

gitpu

eagle

 
 

gu'gu'gwes

owl

 
 

mimiges

butterfly

 
 

amaljugwej

raccoon

 
 

wowgwis

fox

 
 

apigjilu

skunk

 
 

gopit

beaver

 
 

ap'tapegiejit

turkey

 
 

go'qoli'gwej

chicken

 
 

te'plj

goat

 
 

'sqolj

frog

 
 

migjigj

turtle

 
 

mui'n

bear

 
 

mui'ne'j

baby bear

 
 

tia'm

moose

 
 

paqt'sm

wolf

 
 

apli'gmuj

rabbit

 
 

wapus

rabbit

 
 

apigji'j

mouse
